text:
Students of the Government Arts College for Men here boycotted classes demanding improvement of basic amenities here on Monday.

The students observed that they had been demanding improvement of bath room, toilets, drinking water facilities as also a canteen and other basic amenities for quite some years now but the authorities have been turning a deaf ear to all their demands.

The students demanded immediate release of scholarships due to them. After raising slogans for some time, they returned to the classes.
title: Students boycott classes
